name: Trail Edge
description: Create a trail edge from a Rhino line and an optional plane.

inputParameters.name: line
inputParameters.description: A line that defines the end nodes of the edge.

inputParameters.name: length
inputParameters.description: The signed length of the edge. If negative, the edge is in compression. Otherwise, it is in tension. The length magnitude is ignored if a plane is supplied.

inputParameters.name: plane
inputParameters.description: An optional plane to implicitly define the length of the trail edge. The force state will be that specified by the length input parameter.
